title: pratyangirA bhagavatim
sahitya:
pratyangirA bhagavatim sadA namAmyaham prabala sihma vAhArUDhAm


caraNam   nityam shivabhakta varadAm nikhila janAdi nuta nija padAm nitya shuddha 
paramAnandAm nija guruguha mOda kumudAm shaktyAdi samUhAkArAm sharabhEsha 
mada haraNa caturAm kSityAdi tatvAnta rUpAm kSamkArAnanda vilEpAm
